english.segment1: [chorus]. Make me, take me, break me, I am pierced. Make me, take me, break me, I am pierced
english.segment2: Though I am wounded and unworthy. Though I am selfish and untrue. You are holy, You're the healer. You forgave me and made me new. Made me new
english.segment4: Oh, this love, how can it be. That my God would die for me. For my sins, His wounds did bleed. Jesus, you were pierced for me
